clan: XGBoost models on social media metrics by predicting outcomes from a test dataset. It generates scatter plots of actual vs. predicted values and bar plots of top 15 feature importances for each target.
All visualizations are saved as PNGs to aid performance assessment and interpretation.

This AI analyzes photos to predict their performance and potential virality on social media. By extracting visual and contextual features, it estimates metrics like impressions, engagement, and shares. The system helps creators understand what content resonates, enabling smarter content strategies based on predicted audience response and viral potential.
Also I do it real time ;).
method:

The effectiveness and usability of a project depends on the synergies formed between developer and the user.
